title: CT/SADT01 Series UAV-borne Satellite Information Transmission System
explain: CT/SADT01 series UAV-borne satellite information transmission system is used for telemetry & telecontrol and reconnaissance information transmission between UAV and ground stations. Through satellite links, control instructions of the GCS are sent to UAV, and then returning the reconnoitered information and telemetry data of the UAV to the ground. The system includes airborne satellite communication station and vehicular /fixed satellite communication station
features:
Functions

  • Sending remote control commands to UAV through forward link; and through reverse link, the reconnoitered image/data and telemetry data (including equipment monitor information) are back to ground station
  • Simultaneously communicating with two UAVs
  • Link encryption and equipment monitor function

System Feature

  • With low section and miniaturized UAV-borne antenna and mechanical & electric integration and tracking technology
  • Small, light and modularized Airborne equipment
form:
Specifications
Operation frequencyKu, Ka, Ku/Ka
Antenna apertureAirborne SATCOM station：0.6/0.8m
Vehicular/fixed SATCOM station：2.4/6.2m
PA powerAirborne SATCOM station：40/50W
Vehicular/fixed SATCOM station：30W
Transmission rateUplink：12.8/25.6kbps
Downlink：2048/4096kbps
ServicesControl commands, image and data
